## Privacy Policy

### Website Visitors

Like most website operators, Calculator Tools collects non-personally-
identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically
make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site,
and the date and time of each visitor request.

Calculator Tools’s purpose in
collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how
Calculator Tools’s visitors use its website.

Calculator
Tools also collects potentially personally-identifying information like
Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

### Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to Calculator Tools’s websites choose to interact with
Calculator Tools in ways that require Calculator Tools to gather personally-
identifying information.

The amount and type of information that Calculator
Tools gathers depends on the nature of the interaction.

For example, we ask
visitors who use our design application to provide a username and email
address.

In each case, Calculator Tools collects such information only insofar
as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s
interaction with Calculator Tools.

### Aggregated Statistics

Calculator Tools may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its
websites.

Calculator Tools uses cookies to help Calculator Tools
identify and track visitors, their usage of Calculator Tools website, and
their website access preferences.

### Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

Calculator Tools discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-
identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors, and
affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to
process it on Calculator Tools’s behalf or to provide services available at
Calculator Tools’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to
others.

Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may
be located outside of your home country; by using Calculator Tools’s websites,
you consent to the transfer of such information to them.

Calculator Tools will
not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying
information to anyone.

Other than to its employees, contractors, and
affiliated organizations, as described above, Calculator Tools discloses
potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only
when required to do so by law, or when Calculator Tools believes in good faith
that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of
Calculator Tools, third parties, or the public at large.
